amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Expenditures in conflict with role and mission assignments; prohibited.
amendatorysection.para: No funds generated or received from a General Fund appropriation, state aid assistance program, or receipts from a tax levy authorized by statute shall be expended in support of programs or activities which are in conflict with the role and mission assignments applicable to the University of Nebraska, state colleges, or community colleges under sections 79-741, 79-744, 85-194, 85-308, 85-606.01, 85-917 to 85-966, and 85-1511.
